resources.string:
Welcome to Distractless, the App designed to help you become more productive!


 Would you like some help getting started?

Distractless uses a 6 digit pin to help limit procrastination. Avoid easy to guess pins, especially when setting one up for someone else.



Tip: Avoid using 123456, it's not the 1980's!

Distractless can enter focus mode in one of two ways, either at a set time, or as soon as you make your list.



Simply pick the time you want focus mode to start, or press the MAKE A BUTTON button to start focus mode as soon as you're ready.

Now it's time to make your list!



New items can be added by pressing the yellow plus sign. Once you are finished making your list, press the Next Arrow in the top right.

Great! we\'re almost there, all we need to do now is choose how long Distractless will be active. Whether you need an few hours of focus to finish that essay, or a few minutes to tidy up, Distractless can be set to meet your needs!

Look at that, we made it! Nothing left to do now but be productive! Focus mode will now start at the scheduled time, or right now depending on what options you chose.
